content.text: Match ends, Chelsea 2, Everton 1.
Second Half ends, Chelsea 2, Everton 1.
Attempt missed. John Heitinga (Everton) left footed shot from the centre of the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Marouane Fellaini with a headed pass.
Attempt blocked. Marouane Fellaini (Everton) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Phil Jagielka.
Attempt missed. Marouane Fellaini (Everton) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Darron Gibson.
Substitution, Chelsea. Paulo Ferreira replaces Oscar.
Offside, Everton. John Heitinga tries a through ball, but Kevin Mirallas is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Victor Moses (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Fernando Torres.
Attempt missed. Nikica Jelavic (Everton) right footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the right.
Attempt saved. Nikica Jelavic (Everton) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Leighton Baines with a cross.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Phil Jagielka.
Substitution, Chelsea. CÃ©sar Azpilicueta replaces Juan Mata.
David Luiz (Chelsea) is shown the yellow card for hand ball.
Hand ball by David Luiz (Chelsea).
Attempt saved. Nikica Jelavic (Everton) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
Attempt blocked. Steven Pienaar (Everton) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by John Heitinga.
Gary Cahill (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Nikica Jelavic (Everton).
Goal!  Chelsea 2, Everton 1. Fernando Torres (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Victor Moses with a headed pass.
Phil Jagielka (Everton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Fernando Torres (Chelsea).
Attempt missed. Nikica Jelavic (Everton) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Leighton Baines with a cross.
John Heitinga (Everton) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Victor Moses (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by John Heitinga (Everton).
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Branislav Ivanovic.
Attempt saved. Nikica Jelavic (Everton) header from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Marouane Fellaini with a headed pass.
Foul by Ashley Cole (Chelsea).
Marouane Fellaini (Everton) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Attempt missed. Branislav Ivanovic (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Frank Lampard.
Substitution, Everton. John Heitinga replaces Victor Anichebe.
Substitution, Everton. Nikica Jelavic replaces Steven Naismith.
Substitution, Chelsea. Victor Moses replaces Demba Ba.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Seamus Coleman.
Attempt blocked. Demba Ba (Chelsea) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Juan Mata.

Foul by Marouane Fellaini (Everton).
Oscar (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt missed. Gary Cahill (Chelsea) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses the top right corner. Assisted by Juan Mata with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Sylvain Distin.
Attempt blocked. Demba Ba (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Attempt missed. Branislav Ivanovic (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box is high and wide to the right following a corner.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Marouane Fellaini.
Attempt blocked. Oscar (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

Attempt blocked. Demba Ba (Chelsea) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Juan Mata.

Attempt missed. Oscar (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Nathan AkÃ© following a fast break.

Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Tim Howard.
Second Half begins Chelsea 1, Everton 1.
First Half ends, Chelsea 1, Everton 1.
Foul by Victor Anichebe (Everton).
Ashley Cole (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
